channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #138 – Hanging with DigiTen Studios and App Development Consulting Tips – Part 2

item.title: By: Erich Grüttner D.
item.dc:creator: Erich Grüttner D.
item.description:
Wow, I didn't know that "Dig a Way" was made with Corona SDK. It's really a big inspiration for me. I hope you can make another hangout with them (DigiTen Studios) to talk about technical details, like what tools they use, performance tips, etc.
Congratulations!
item.content:encoded:
Wow, I didn’t know that “Dig a Way” was made with Corona SDK. It’s really a big inspiration for me.
I hope you can make another hangout with them (DigiTen Studios) to talk about technical details, like what tools they use, performance tips, etc.

Congratulations!
